title: PayPal Payment Keeps Redirecting to Paypal
body:
I'm trying to purchase RP through PayPal, but I keep getting redirected to my PayPal account profile after logging into my account. It usually redirects to the page with method of payment and stuff, but that's not the case for me. Can anyone please help?

[](https://imgur.com/a/VNhfT)

replies.body: Hey it looks like you're already chatting with Crabgamer!  He'll be helping you out, so hit him up with any questions you've got.  :D
